translations.chinese: 初，項梁立韓後公子成為韓王，張良為韓司徒。
translations.english: Initially, Xiang Liang established the Han royal descendant Cheng as King of Han, with Zhang Liang as Han tutor.

translations.chinese: 羽以良從漢王，韓王成又無功，故不遣就國，與俱至彭 城，殺之。
translations.english: Xiang Yu, because Liang followed King Han, and King Han Cheng had no merit, did not send him to his kingdom but brought him to Pengcheng and killed him.

translations.chinese: 及聞漢王并關中，而齊、梁畔之，羽大怒，乃以故吳令鄭昌為韓王，距漢。
translations.english: When he heard that King Han had united Guanzhong and Qi and Liang had rebelled, Xiang Yu was greatly angered. He established the former Wu magistrate Zheng Chang as King of Han to oppose Han.

translations.chinese: 令蕭公角擊彭越，越敗角兵。
translations.english: He ordered Xiao Gong Jiao to attack Peng Yue. Yue defeated Jiao's troops.

translations.chinese: 時張良徇韓地，遺羽書曰：「漢欲得關中，如約 即止，不敢復東。」
translations.english: At this time Zhang Liang was campaigning in Han territory. He sent Xiang Yu a letter: "Han wishes to obtain Guanzhong. If the agreement is honored, we will stop and dare not advance east again."
